Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This unique offering is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its exceptional features and capabilities, I believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its value, I am offering it to you for $15000. This is an opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive price. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
